筕字的基本解释

筕
háng
〔筕篖（
t俷g ）〕竹编的粗糙席子。

筕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［háng］
［《廣韻》胡郎切，平唐，匣。］
［《廣韻》户庚切，平庚，匣。］
见“筕篖”。

筕字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　筕； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页883第17
【廣韻】戸庚切【集韻】何庚切，?音行。筕篖，竹笪也。【揚子·方言】筕篖，自關而東，周洛楚魏之閒謂之倚佯。自關而西，謂之筕篖。【註】筕篖，似籧篨，直文而麤，江東呼爲笪。【本草】筕簹，竹簟別名。　又【廣韻】胡郞切【集韻】寒剛切，?音杭。義同。

筕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
筕字的起名意思

暂无。

Shao
Basic explanation of words
Shao
háng
〔筕篖(
t 俷g)] a rough mat made of bamboo.
Shao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［háng］
["Guangyun" Hu Langqie, Ping Tang, Xie. ]
["Guangyun" Hu Gengqie, Ping Geng, Xie. ]
See "Jiaoji".
Shao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　筕; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 883 Page 17
[Guang Yun] Jian Gengqie 【Jiyun】He Gengqie, sound line. Shao, bamboo strips are also. [Yangtze Dialect] Shao, from Guan to East, Zhou Luo Chu, Wei Zhi Xian called the lie. From the Guan to the west, it is called the 筕篖. [Note] Shaoqi, similar to shaoqi, straight and thick, Jiangdong calls for shao. [Materia Medica] Jundang, the alias of Zhuzhu.　[Guang Yun] Hu Yun cut [Ji Yun] Han Gang cut,? Yinhang. The same meaning.
Shao
